title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.22 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.22 - Purpose

State Regulations

The commission adopts these rules for totalisator
companies to ensure all totalisator operations are adequate to maintain the
integrity of pari-mutuel wagering. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4300.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
